patthana11.13:1.1: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.13:2.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
